name: Shimano MW5 Cycling Shoes - Unisex
description: For winter riders, grab your studded tires or your fatbike and pull on these shoes. They're insulated and use a waterproof-breathable membrane to keep your toes warm in rough and slushy conditions.Shimano Dryshield membrane provides waterproof-breathable protection.Fleece lining keeps your feet toasty.Neoprene ankle cuff and lace flap help keep out rain, snow and mud.Speed Lacing System allow fast, easy adjustments and a secure fit.Synthetic leather upper is tougher and lighter than natural leathers.Durable rubber tread offers excellent grip and traction.
